channel.title: dazz on DazzLog
channel.description: Recent content in dazz on DazzLog

item.title: about
item.description: I love programming and most parts of it is trying to figure out how things can be used to make the life easier for everyone. Symfony is making my life easier since 2012, and I’m now the organizer of the Symfony Usergroup Berlin. I’m member of c-base the crashed space station in berlin and there I experiment with all the other carbon based beings how to interact in a future compatible style.
